feature_description: Fix Tasting Item Naming and Navigation Issues Based on User Feedback
problem_statement: After reviewing the mobile app screenshots more carefully, the main issues are: 1) Items are showing generic names like 'Coffee 1', 'Coffee 2' instead of meaningful names, 2) The item name editing is not clearly discoverable (user specifically mentions needing an 'editable field'), 3) Photo upload button is missing or not visible, and 4) For sessions with many items, there's no 'jump to' feature to quickly navigate to specific items (user mentions being on 'item 100 and wanting to edit item 3').

item_naming_issue.user_feedback: 'default this to item 1, item 2 etc with editable field so they can change the name'
item_naming_issue.current_behavior: Items get auto-named as '{Category} {Number}' in QuickTastingSession.tsx line 222
item_naming_issue.problem: Generic numbering doesn't help users identify specific items, and editing isn't obvious

editing_discoverability.what_user_sees: Item names appear as plain text with only a small edit icon on hover
editing_discoverability.user_feedback: User specifically mentions needing an 'editable field' - suggests current editing isn't clear
editing_discoverability.current_behavior: Edit icon only visible on hover in TastingItem.tsx lines 243-245
editing_discoverability.problem: Not immediately obvious that item names can be edited, inconsistent with session name editing UX

missing_photo_upload.what_user_sees: No visible photo upload button in the item interface
missing_photo_upload.user_feedback: 'also the upload image button' - suggests it's missing or not visible
missing_photo_upload.current_behavior: Photo upload exists in TastingItem.tsx but may not be prominently displayed
missing_photo_upload.problem: Photo upload functionality exists but isn't discoverable in the UI

navigation_scalability.what_user_sees: Navigation shows 'Item 3 of 3' with Previous/Next buttons
navigation_scalability.user_feedback: 'maybe this can have a jump to feature in case you are on item 100 and want to edit item 3'
navigation_scalability.current_behavior: Only Previous/Next navigation, no direct item jumping
navigation_scalability.problem: For sessions with many items, navigating to specific items is inefficient
